Trustee_9_pre_2.name: Elena Ivanova
Trustee_9_pre_2.content: My commitment to ensuring a fair profit distribution during this investment process has reinforced my reputation as a trustworthy trustee. By following the agreed-upon allocation plan, I have built trust with my investor, showcased my pro-sociality, and demonstrated my competence in managing the investment successfully. This positive interaction highlights my nurturing approach, aiming for equitable solutions that benefit all parties involved.

Investor_9_pre_3.name: Elena Ivanova
Investor_9_pre_3.content: Throughout the investment process, I have demonstrated a commitment to fairness, collaboration, and transparency. My active engagement and understanding of the allocation plan have led to positive outcomes, thereby strengthening my reputation as a considerate and involved investor. My focus on mutual success highlights my pro-social behavior and reliability.
